components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
All of Titanium.Platform.DisplayCaps properties are read only, and should not have setter functions in the documentation.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/2.1/index.html#!/api/Titanium.Platform.DisplayCaps-method-setDensity
fields.summary: APIDoc: All of Titanium.Platform.DisplayCaps properties are read only, and should not have setter functions

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress over the past few years.To add, the URL provided is no longer working.
